transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	FolderName as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: [('CMS_V2_landing/' + $FolderName),('CMS_V2/' + $FolderName)],
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Raw2DB
MapDrifted1 derive(SourceID = 1,
		ServerPlatform = 'CMS_V2') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceID,
		ServerId,
		ServerInstance,
		ServerName,
		ServerPlatform
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Raw2DB derive(ServerId = toInteger(byName('ServerId')),
		ServerInstance = toString(byName('Name')),
		ServerName = toString(byName('Description'))) ~> MapDrifted1
Select sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SourceID,
		ServerID = ServerId,
		ServerInstance,
		ServerName,
		ServerPlatform
	)) ~> sink1
